main_description: The annual AAA Fashion Show strives to promote the mission statement of the organization through a year long production. Itâ€™s an opportunity for students of all backgrounds to come together and experience something unforgettable through the medium of dance. This year, our theme seeks to explore fundamental social issues that motivate discussion not only in the APA communities, but in communities globally. The show will provide a story that speaks to people from all walks of life. The show will consist of five different scenes, each uniquely designed to explore a different issue and engage those involved in an unforgettable way.

scenes.name: Bizcaz Scene
scenes.description: Business Casual Scene is a bit different than the other scenes. Our scene isn't really tied to or associated with any specific genre of dance, but it is mostly filled with the upbeat fun hip-hop feels.

scenes.name: Cultural Scene
scenes.description: Cultural scene represents a multitude of asian cultures through different styles of dances. This year we will be doing a traditional ribbon dance, martial arts, kpop, and a fashion show runway. If you are interested in any of the above come check us out! Join us to make new friends and express yourself in a multitude of different dances!

scenes.name: Formal Scene
scenes.description: Dress up, meet new people, and show the world some partner dancing. Formal Scene will explore styles from waltz and tango, to salsa and hip hop, and everything in between.

scenes.name: Modern Scene
scenes.description: Feeling expressive? Modern scene is designed to get you in touch with your emotions and the dancer we all have hidden inside! Get ready to touch the audience with a dramatic mix of lyrical hiphop and contemporary choreography!

scenes.name: Nightlife Scene
scenes.description: Turn down the lights and get ready to move! Nightlife Scene explores the varied styles of street dance over a framework of eclectic beats. Squad up and channel some unfiltered emotion into the hip-hop choreography of hard hits and flow!
